name: MediaStream.onaddtrack
description: The MediaStream.onaddtrack property is an EventHandler which specifies a function to be called when the addtrack event occurs on a MediaStream instance. This happens when a new track of any kind is added to the media stream.

refs.name: Media Capture and Streams
refs.description: The definition of 'MediaStream.onaddtrack' in the 'Media Capture and Streams' specification.
